comments.html: I'd love to see a sanitized version of this posted to GitHub!
comments.name: Yostie

comments.html: Very nice project to read about, thanks for sharing. What's described here really attests to the potential of relatively basic automation for enterprise networks. Each week, multiple items get published that make me want to attend this automation course more :)
comments.name: Jaap de Vos

comments.html: WOW... seconding comment by Yostie above - would love to see some of the inner workings on GitHub! :)
comments.name: Salman Naqvi
